alert.note: Alert for Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:17PM CDT until June 28 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WARREN...NORTHEASTERN CLAIBORNE...SOUTHWESTERN HINDS AND NORTHWESTERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 217 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Utica, or 18 miles southwest of Raymond, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dentville around 245 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
